data.name: startpagina.nl/v 2020
data.description:
Desktopstijl voor GV voor wijde monitoren.
Geen last meer van verkoudheid...

data.name: VK Crystal
Yugioh Fandom Darkmode
data.description: A darkmode for the yugioh fandom website

data.name: Dark Folding@Home
data.description: This theme supports the client as well as the statistics. Thanks to Mondanzo for its Folding@Home Client Light theme which serves as the basis for the client's graphic modifications. The source code is available on Github. You are free to contribute or report any problems with the style.

data.name: Dark EcoleDirecte
data.description: This style is designed to work on version 3.6.1 of the EcoleDirecte site, the style may no longer work correctly following updates of it. The source code is available on Github. You are free to contribute or report any problems with the style.

data.name: Dark France.TV
data.description: A dark theme for France TV

data.name: WaniKani Pastel Style
data.description: A pastel style for WaniKani. Probably won't be suitable for most users, as some text can be hard to read, but I made this for my dying laptop monitor that doesn't work well with bright colours.

data.name: NWS Radar Dark Theme
data.description: A dark theme for the radar sub domain of weather.gov

data.name: Userstyles Officially Slow Branding
data.description:
One of the slowest dumpster fire websites that deserve the "Officially Slow" branding Logo!
Step right up and install it, if you can even get to the page to install it. lol
